headline: Mark Cuban urges Congress to make healthcare companies divest
summary: Healthcare affordability is in focus as lawmakers meet with health insurance executives on Capitol Hill. Additionally, Mark Cuban called on Congress to make health insurance companies divest from all non-insurance assets. Capital Alpha Partners founding partner Kim Monk sits down with Market Domination host Josh Lipton to explain why this is unlikely to happen. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Democrats & Republicans find some common ground on health insurers
summary: Health insurance companies are in focus after executives met with US lawmakers on Capitol Hill to address affordability concerns and rising healthcare costs. Capital Alpha Partners founding partner Kim Monk joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to discuss takeaways from the hearing. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Earnings live: Intel stock plunges, with more Big Tech earnings from Apple, Microsoft, and Tesla ahead
summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear in the week ahead, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.

headline: Fed Meeting, Apple, Microsoft Earnings: What to Watch Next Week
summary: It's shaping up to be a busy week ahead. Earnings season is in full throttle, with results expected from the likes of UnitedHealth, Chevron and Boeing. A trio of tech giants—Apple, Meta Platforms and Microsoft—will also report earnings.

headline: UnitedHealth Stock Climbs 7.3% as Reddit Rage Fades to Neutral
summary: UnitedHealth Group (NYSE:UNH) shares rose 7.3% over the past week as retail investor sentiment on Reddit and X shifted from deeply bearish to neutral. Trading around $355, the stock has stabilized after falling significantly from its 52-week high following the December 2024 shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson. headline: Express Scripts considering settlement in FTC insulin price lawsuit
summary: The antitrust agency paused its lawsuit against the pharmacy benefit manager while the two discuss a proposed consent agreement.

headline: Minneapolis ICE Standoff Has Become the Political Issue CEOs Can’t Ignore
summary: The immigration-enforcement operation in Minnesota is pushing the bosses of businesses like Hilton and Target to change their playbooks.
